original: snying po las ni snying po mchog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: snying po las ni snying po mchog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is the supreme.

original: de la chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ni nyan thos pa'i theg pa dang theg pa chen po dgu khri dang sngags kyi theg pa chen po 'bum du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ni nyan thos pa'i theg pa dang theg pa chen po dgu khri dang sngags kyi theg pa chen po 'bum du shes par bya'o //
translated: Therein, the eighty-four thousand aggregates of Dharma should be understood as the ninety thousand of the Vehicle of the Disciples and the one hundred thousand of the Great Vehicle of Mantra.

original: de bas na chos kyi phung po de rnams su thub pa chen pos mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid ni rim pa gnyis pa las gsungs pa 'am /
analyzed: de bas na chos kyi phung po de rnams su thub pa chen pos mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid ni rim pa gnyis pa las gsungs pa 'am /
translated: Therefore, among those aggregates of Dharma, the characteristic of manifest enlightenment taught by the Great Sage is either that taught in the second stage

original: bzhi pa las gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bzhi pa las gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: or that taught in the fourth stage.

original: snying po las kyang snying po mchog / ces pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa snying po ste de las snying po ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: snying po las kyang snying po mchog / ces pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa snying po ste de las snying po ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: The stage of the creation process is the essence, and the stage of vajra repetition is the essence of that essence.

original: de las kyang mchog ni khyad par can du gsungs so //
analyzed: de las kyang mchog ni khyad par can du gsungs so //
translated: The best of that is said to be the special stage.

original: de la nyan thos pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid de nyid 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas gzung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can rnams kyis de nyid rjes su dpag pa'i phyi'i don 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i sgo nas gzung ba dang /
analyzed: de la nyan thos pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid de nyid 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas gzung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can rnams kyis de nyid rjes su dpag pa'i phyi'i don 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i sgo nas gzung ba dang /
translated: The ≈õrƒÅvakas apprehend reality by means of the meditative absorption of cessation. Those of the pratyekabuddha type apprehend it by means of the aspect of apprehending external objects by means of inference.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa'i sgo nas de nyid gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa'i sgo nas de nyid gzung ba yin no //
translated: The YogƒÅcƒÅra apprehend reality by means of the aspect of having aspects and the aspect of being without aspects.

original: de la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa kho na yod pa'o zhes kha cig 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa kho na yod pa'o zhes kha cig 'dod pa'o //
translated: Some assert that only the foundation consciousness exists.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa kho na'o zhes kha cig 'dod do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa kho na'o zhes kha cig 'dod do //
translated: Some assert that only the afflicted mind and the engaging consciousness exist.

original: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug kho na kha cig gis 'dod do //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug kho na kha cig gis 'dod do //
translated: Some assert that the six consciousnesses are the only ones that engage.üîΩSome assert that the eight consciousnesses are the only ones that engage.

original: rnam par shes pa brgyad kha cig gis 'dod pa ste rnal 'byor spyod pa'i phyogs bzhi'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa brgyad kha cig gis 'dod pa ste rnal 'byor spyod pa'i phyogs bzhi'o //
translated: These are the four positions of the YogƒÅcƒÅra.

original: rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba'i phyir don logs su 'grub pa dang / rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa logs su 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba'i phyir don logs su 'grub pa dang / rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa logs su 'grub pa ste /
translated: The SautrƒÅntika-MƒÅdhyamikas apprehend suchness as follows: Because they arise from causes and conditions, external objects are not established as separate entities, and consciousness without aspects is not established as a separate entity.

original: de gnyi ga yang rang bzhin med pa'o zhes mdo sde'i dgu ma pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid gzung ba yin no //üîΩphyi'i dngos po ni ye shes kyi rnam pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de gnyi ga yang rang bzhin med pa'o zhes mdo sde'i dgu ma pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid gzung ba yin no // phyi'i dngos po ni ye shes kyi rnam pa kho na yin te /
translated: Both of those are devoid of intrinsic existence.

original: de yang rang bzhin med pa'o zhes rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dbu ma pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid gzung ba yin @240b no //üîΩmthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam rnams kyis nyon mongs pa spangs te /
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin med pa'o zhes rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dbu ma pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid gzung ba yin @240b no // mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam rnams kyis nyon mongs pa spangs te /
translated: The YogƒÅcƒÅra-MƒÅdhyamikas apprehend suchness as follows: External things are only the aspects of consciousness, and even that is devoid of intrinsic existence.üîΩThe Mother of the Victorious Ones, the MƒÅdhyamikas who follow the mother of the victors, assert that the view of suchness is as follows: The afflictions are abandoned by the paths of seeing and meditation.

original: chos kyi sku thob pa'o zhes rgyal ba'i yum gyi dbu ma pa rnams grub pa'i mtha' 'dod do //
analyzed: chos kyi sku thob pa'o zhes rgyal ba'i yum gyi dbu ma pa rnams grub pa'i mtha' 'dod do //
translated: The dharmakƒÅya is attained.

original: bya ba'i rgyud la gnas pa rnams khyad par gyi lha'i rnam pa kho na'i de kho na nyid 'dod pa dang / spyod pa'i rgyud la gnas pa rnams rol mo la sogs pa'i tha mal pa ma yin pa'i spyod pas lha'i rnam pa kho na'i de kho na nyid 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud la gnas pa rnams khyad par gyi lha'i rnam pa kho na'i de kho na nyid 'dod pa dang / spyod pa'i rgyud la gnas pa rnams rol mo la sogs pa'i tha mal pa ma yin pa'i spyod pas lha'i rnam pa kho na'i de kho na nyid 'dod pa dang /
translated: Those abiding in action tantra assert the suchness of the deity's form alone.üîΩThose abiding in conduct tantra assert the suchness of the deity's form alone through conduct that is not ordinary, such as music and so on.üîΩThose abiding in yoga tantra assert the suchness of the deity's form alone that is attained through mantra, mudra, and samadhi.

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la gnas pa rnams sngags dang phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis thob pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha'i sku kho na nyid 'dod pa dang / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la gnas pa rnams bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro ba'i lus rnam par dben pa'i mtha' can de kho na nyid 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la gnas pa rnams sngags dang phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis thob pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha'i sku kho na nyid 'dod pa dang / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la gnas pa rnams bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro ba'i lus rnam par dben pa'i mtha' can de kho na nyid 'dod pa dang /
translated: Those abiding in mahayoga tantra assert the suchness of the body that is the culmination of physical isolation preceded by the three samadhis of the yoga of the creation stage.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa kha cig ngag rnam par dben pa ma yin pa dang / kha cig sems kyi 'od gsal ba dang / kha cig sgyu ma'i sku dang / kha cig phyi'i mngon par byang chub pa dang / kha cig mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa kha cig ngag rnam par dben pa ma yin pa dang / kha cig sems kyi 'od gsal ba dang / kha cig sgyu ma'i sku dang / kha cig phyi'i mngon par byang chub pa dang / kha cig mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid 'dod pa yin te /
translated: Some who abide in the stage of completion assert the reality of non-separation of speech, some the clear light of mind, some the illusory body, some the outer manifest enlightenment, and some the non-abiding nirvana.

original: dngos po rnam par dpyad na chos kyi sku las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid gzhan kho na yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po rnam par dpyad na chos kyi sku las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid gzhan kho na yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But when things are analyzed, there is no reality other than the Dharma Body.

original: khyad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the differentiator.

original: de bas de nyid mngon par byang chub pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas de nyid mngon par byang chub pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, that is the manifest enlightenment.

original: de mngon du byas na lam thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de mngon du byas na lam thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: When that is realized, all paths are realized.

original: rten gyi dbye bas lta ba rnams tha dad pa ste de kho na nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rten gyi dbye bas lta ba rnams tha dad pa ste de kho na nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: The views are different because of the difference in the basis, but not the reality.

original: gzhan du de nyid kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du de nyid kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be reality.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: chos kyi dbyings ni dbye med phyir //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni dbye med phyir //
translated: Because the Dharma realm is undifferentiated,

original: rigs dbye ba ni rigs pa min //
analyzed: rigs dbye ba ni rigs pa min //
translated: The differentiation of lineages is not reasonable.

original: gzhi can chos kyi dbye ba yis //üîΩde yid bye ba so sor bshad //
analyzed: gzhi can chos kyi dbye ba yis // de yid bye ba so sor bshad //
translated: By the classification of the bases and phenomena,

original: ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: those are explained as individual types of mind.üîΩNow, in order to explain that even asceticism, etc. are not held to be that in reality,

original: da ni brtul zhugs la sogs pa yang de'i don du de kho nar gzung ba ma yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni brtul zhugs la sogs pa yang de'i don du de kho nar gzung ba ma yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: it is said:üîΩThe one-braided, the naked, the shaven-headed,

original: ral pa gcer bu mgo reg dang // cod pan 'dus pa spong 'jug ste //
analyzed: ral pa gcer bu mgo reg dang // cod pan 'dus pa spong 'jug ste //
translated: the turbaned, the renunciant, the householder,

original: sna tshogs rtogs can de dang ni //
analyzed: sna tshogs rtogs can de dang ni //
translated: those with various signs,

original: mngon par byang chub 'dod pa rnams //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mngon par byang chub 'dod pa rnams // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: and those who desire manifest enlightenment,

original: ral pa gcig ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: ral pa gcig ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs pa'o //
translated: The one-braided is the one with the knowledge vow.

original: gcer bu ni spyod pa'i brtul zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: gcer bu ni spyod pa'i brtul zhugs pa'o //
translated: The naked is the one with the conduct vow.

original: mgo reg ni dge slong dang dge tshul la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mgo reg ni dge slong dang dge tshul la sogs pa'o //
translated: The shaven-headed is the fully ordained monk, novice monk, etc.

original: cod pan ni bslab pa lnga la gnas pa'i dge bsnyen no //
analyzed: cod pan ni bslab pa lnga la gnas pa'i dge bsnyen no //
translated: The turbaned is the lay practitioner who abides in the five precepts.

original: 'dus pa spong 'jug ni tshem bu pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa spong 'jug ni tshem bu pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The renunciant and householder are the yogis of the Aupamanyava school.

original: sna tshogs rtags can de @241a * //
analyzed: sna tshogs rtags can de @241a * //
translated: Those with various signs

original: dang ni // zhes pa ni brtul zhugs sbyangs ba'i yon tan la sogs pa'i rtags te /
analyzed: dang ni // zhes pa ni brtul zhugs sbyangs ba'i yon tan la sogs pa'i rtags te /
translated: indicates the signs of the qualities of purified discipline and so forth.

original: dka' thub spyod pa'i mtshan nyid de rnams kyis mngon par byang chub 'dod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: dka' thub spyod pa'i mtshan nyid de rnams kyis mngon par byang chub 'dod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Those who desire manifest enlightenment alone have the characteristics of practicing austerities.

original: de rnams gzhan gyi don du 'bad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams gzhan gyi don du 'bad pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not strive for the benefit of others.üîΩIn order to explain that discipline alone is not the cause of attaining reality,

original: brtul zhugs kho na de kho na nyid thob pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: brtul zhugs kho na de kho na nyid thob pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: it is said:

original: de nyid dman pa de rnams kyis //
analyzed: de nyid dman pa de rnams kyis //
translated: By those of inferior reality

original: brtul zhugs spyod pa la sogs rim //
analyzed: brtul zhugs spyod pa la sogs rim //
translated: the stages of practicing discipline and so forth.

original: de nyid ye shes dman pas na //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes dman pas na //
translated: By inferior wisdom of reality

original: des ni grol bar rnyed mi 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: des ni grol bar rnyed mi 'gyur // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: they will not find liberation.

original: ral pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa de rnams gal te de kho na nyid bral ba yin na de'i tshe de rnams kyi brtul zhugs la sogs pa spyod pa'i rim pa don med pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: ral pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa de rnams gal te de kho na nyid bral ba yin na de'i tshe de rnams kyi brtul zhugs la sogs pa spyod pa'i rim pa don med pa kho na yin te /
translated: If those who hold dreadlocks and so forth are devoid of reality, then at that time the stages of practicing discipline and so forth for them are meaningless alone.

original: 'on tang khur bu khur ba lta bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on tang khur bu khur ba lta bur 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, they would be like a burden bearer.

original: de bas na de kho na nyid med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na de kho na nyid med pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since reality does not exist,

original: brtul zhugs la sogs pa de yis grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtul zhugs la sogs pa de yis grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: one is not liberated by that discipline, etc.

original: gdan bzhi'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: gdan bzhi'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: The Catuhpitha Tantra also says,

original: de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor la //
analyzed: de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor la //
translated: For the yogi/nƒ´ who lacks reality,

original: glang po'i dril bu sgra sgrogs ltar //
analyzed: glang po'i dril bu sgra sgrogs ltar //
translated: like the sound of an elephant's drum,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //üîΩde bas na de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa kho na grol ba'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so // de bas na de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa kho na grol ba'i rgyu yin te /
translated: it is said.

original: brtul zhugs la sogs pa med na yang de nyid rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtul zhugs la sogs pa med na yang de nyid rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, only the thorough knowledge of reality is the cause of liberation, because one realizes reality even without discipline, etc.

original: de kho na nyid med na brtul zhugs la sogs pa don med de 'on tang khur bu khur ba'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid med na brtul zhugs la sogs pa don med de 'on tang khur bu khur ba'o //
translated: If reality does not exist, discipline, etc. are meaningless, and so one is just carrying a burden.

original: brtul zhugs la sogs pa bstan pa ni drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: brtul zhugs la sogs pa bstan pa ni drang ba'i don to //
translated: The teaching of discipline, etc. is of provisional meaning.

original: de la zhen pa'i sems can gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la zhen pa'i sems can gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is for the sake of guiding those sentient beings who are attached to it.

original: de bas brtul zhugs med kyang de kho na nyid mngon du bya'o //
analyzed: de bas brtul zhugs med kyang de kho na nyid mngon du bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should realize reality even without discipline.

original: da ni sa'i rim pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni sa'i rim pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the stages of the levels,

original: dang po las kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dang po las kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: first, through the application of karma,

original: sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: One attains the eighth stage.

original: snang ba gsum po mthong ba dag / sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
analyzed: snang ba gsum po mthong ba dag / sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
translated: Seeing the three appearances, one is well-positioned on the ten stages.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: las dang po pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: las dang po pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: The beginner is the yogi/nƒ´ of the stage of generation.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa ste /
translated: His/her practice is the cultivation of the three samƒÅdhis, the first union, and so forth.

original: lus rnam par dben ba'i mtha' can gang yin pa de yis /
analyzed: lus rnam par dben ba'i mtha' can gang yin pa de yis /
translated: By that, which has the conclusion of the isolation of the body,

original: sa brgyad pa ni mi g-yo ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa ni mi g-yo ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: one attains the eighth stage, the Immovable.

original: don gyis na rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pas sa dgu pa thob pa dang / snang ba gsum po mthong ba ye shes dbang du gyur pa'i phyir sa bcu pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyis na rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pas sa dgu pa thob pa dang / snang ba gsum po mthong ba ye shes dbang du gyur pa'i phyir sa bcu pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the stage of vajra repetition, one attains the ninth stage, and by seeing the three appearances, one attains the tenth stage, because of the mastery of gnosis.

original: de'i rjes las thob pa'i phyir sgyur ma'i sku sa bcu pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes las thob pa'i phyir sgyur ma'i sku sa bcu pa kho na'o //
translated: The enjoyment body is on the tenth stage alone, because it is subsequent to that.

original: rim bzhi pas bcu gcig kun du 'od kyi sa thob pa'o //
analyzed: rim bzhi pas bcu gcig kun du 'od kyi sa thob pa'o //
translated: By the fourth stage, one attains the eleventh stage, the stage of Universal Radiance.

original: de'i rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyis rdo rje'i sku'i sku ni sa bcu gcig pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyis rdo rje'i sku'i sku ni sa bcu gcig pa kho na'o //
translated: After that, the knowledge of the post-meditation state is the body of the vajra body, which is the eleventh stage alone.

original: @241b las dang po pa'i sa ni tshangs pa'i gnas la sogs pa bsgoms pas thob pa yin no //
analyzed: @241b las dang po pa'i sa ni tshangs pa'i gnas la sogs pa bsgoms pas thob pa yin no //
translated: The stage of the beginner is attained by the meditation on the Brahma abodes, etc.

original: de ltar nas bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: de ltar nas bcu gnyis so //
translated: Thus, there are twelve stages.

original: shin tu bde ba dang / shin tu myur bar rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pas gang zhig tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas thob pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu bde ba dang / shin tu myur bar rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pas gang zhig tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas thob pa ste /
translated: The person who is very happy and very quick in the knowledge of the meditation attains Buddhahood in this very life.

original: de nyid sa bcu gsum pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid sa bcu gsum pa zhes bshad do //
translated: That is explained as the thirteenth stage.

original: da ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas de kho na nyid thob nas gang mdzad pa de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas de kho na nyid thob nas gang mdzad pa de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain what the youth Sarvarthasiddha did after attaining reality,

original: mngon par byang chub legs thob nas //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub legs thob nas //
translated: having attained the excellent manifest enlightenment,

original: gtsang ma'i gnas su nye bar 'gro //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i gnas su nye bar 'gro //
translated: he went to the pure abode,

original: sangs rgyas zhing nas mi ldog pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing nas mi ldog pas //
translated: not turning back from the Buddha field,

original: tshe 'di nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen //
translated: he became omniscient in this very life.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: sh'akya thub pa des mngon par byang chub thob nas sems can gyi don mdzad de /
analyzed: sh'akya thub pa des mngon par byang chub thob nas sems can gyi don mdzad de /
translated: After Shakyamuni attained manifest enlightenment, he acted for the sake of sentient beings.

original: gtsang ma'i gnas ni 'phags pa'i gnas su shes pa'o //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i gnas ni 'phags pa'i gnas su shes pa'o //
translated: The pure abodes are known as the abodes of the aryas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin te /

translated: Having heard that, the guru generates great compassion for that disciple.

original: bla mas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa de la brtsam pa ni bshad par bya ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: bla mas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa de la brtsam pa ni bshad par bya ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Then, begins the self-consecration means that the guru should explain the stage of self-consecration. This is a literal explanation.

original: de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir ro /
translated: In order to explain that, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares,

original: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim zhes pa /
analyzed: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim zhes pa /
translated: The stage of self-consecration

original: kun rdzob bden pa mthong ba ste /üîΩde ni bla ma'i drin dag gis //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa mthong ba ste / de ni bla ma'i drin dag gis //
translated: is the vision of the conventional truth.üîΩIt is attained by the grace of the guru,

original: thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /üîΩgang zhig snang ba nye bar thob pa la sogs pa 'am /
analyzed: thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min // zhes bya ba gsungs te / gang zhig snang ba nye bar thob pa la sogs pa 'am /
translated: not otherwise.üîΩThe vision of the conventional truth is the appearance of the body of intuitive wisdom, either gradually, through the attainment of the light, etc.üîΩ, or instantaneously, through the power of former vows, and it is illustrated by the twelve examples such as illusion.

original: cig car du sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis ye shes kyi sku 'byung ba de'i bden pa mthong ba sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi nye bar mtshon par gang yin pa de ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: cig car du sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis ye shes kyi sku 'byung ba de'i bden pa mthong ba sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi nye bar mtshon par gang yin pa de ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa zhes bshad do //
translated: That is explained as the stage of self-consecration.

original: de la sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis dang sbyar ba ni bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //üîΩde yang rtsa ba sgyu ma'i dpe yin te /
analyzed: de la sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis dang sbyar ba ni bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o // de yang rtsa ba sgyu ma'i dpe yin te /
translated: The application of the twelve examples of illusion should be understood as explained in the commentary.

original: nye ba'i sgyu ma'i dpe de dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i sgyu ma'i dpe de dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the root example of illusion is applied to the proximate example of illusion.

original: de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: skar ma dang / rab rib dang / mar me dang / sgyu ma dang / zil ba dang / chu shing dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mgal mi'i 'khor lo dang / gtsub shing las 'byung ba'i me dang /
analyzed: skar ma dang / rab rib dang / mar me dang / sgyu ma dang / zil ba dang / chu shing dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mgal mi'i 'khor lo dang / gtsub shing las 'byung ba'i me dang /
translated: stars,üîΩeye disease,üîΩbutter lamps,üîΩillusions,üîΩdew,üîΩbananas,üîΩsunlight,üîΩgandharva cities,üîΩfire-wheels,üîΩand fire that arises from rubbing sticks together.

original: mo gsham gyi bu dang / nam mkha'i me tog ste de rnams dang sbyar la bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu dang / nam mkha'i me tog ste de rnams dang sbyar la bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: The stages of self-consecration are taught by applying these to the star, the cataract, the lamp, the illusion, the dewdrop, the plantain tree, the sunbeam, the city of Gandharvas, the fire wheel, and the fire that arises from the rubbing together of sticks.

original: de yang bla ma'i drin gyis thob par gyur te rang bzo ni ma yin no //üîΩde gang gi phyir rdo rje slob dpon gyi go bzlog pa'am /
analyzed: de yang bla ma'i drin gyis thob par gyur te rang bzo ni ma yin no // de gang gi phyir rdo rje slob dpon gyi go bzlog pa'am /
translated: And that is obtained through the grace of the guru, not through one's own ingenuity.

original: cig car gyi rim pas de kho na nyid gsum pa ma bstan na /
analyzed: cig car gyi rim pas de kho na nyid gsum pa ma bstan na /
translated: For if the reality of the three stages is not taught by the guru through the reversal of the vajra master or the instantaneous process,

original: de'i slob mas de'i rang bzhin shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i slob mas de'i rang bzhin shes pa ma yin te /
translated: then the disciple will not know its nature.

original: sgyu ma'i dpe dang gang sbyar bar bya'o zhes bla ma'i man ngag med na de yang shes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i dpe dang gang sbyar bar bya'o zhes bla ma'i man ngag med na de yang shes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And if there is no instruction from the guru, one will not know which of the examples of illusion to apply.

original: de bas de'i bsnyen bkur kho na bya'o //
analyzed: de bas de'i bsnyen bkur kho na bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should only serve the guru.

original: 'dir ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba rjes su smras nas /
analyzed: 'dir ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba rjes su smras nas /
translated: Here, having spoken of the seeing of the conventional truth,

original: bdag @248b la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ma shes pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag @248b la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ma shes pa shes par bya'o //
translated: one should know the stage of self-consecration.

original: rim pa gsum pa med na bstan bcos la 'bad pa don med pa yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rim pa gsum pa med na bstan bcos la 'bad pa don med pa yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain that if there is no third stage, then effort in the treatise is pointless,üîΩit is said:

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim //
translated: The stage of self-consecration

original: gang gis rnyed par mi 'gyur pa //
analyzed: gang gis rnyed par mi 'gyur pa //
translated: is not to be found

original: mdo sde rgyud dang rtogs pa la //üîΩde yi ngal ba don med 'gyur //
analyzed: mdo sde rgyud dang rtogs pa la // de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur //
translated: in the sutras, tantras, or treatises.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, effort in them is pointless.

original: sngar bshad pa'i bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa gang gis bla ma'i zhal nas ma rnyed pa de'i mdo sde la brtson pa la 'bad pa ni rtsol ba 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa gang gis bla ma'i zhal nas ma rnyed pa de'i mdo sde la brtson pa la 'bad pa ni rtsol ba 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
translated: By the stage of self-consecration explained above, if one does not find it from the guru's mouth, then effort in the sutras is pointless effort.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the illusion-like samadhi is not actualized.

original: de gang gi phyir dngos po 'dzin pa la sgom pa 'khor ba kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gang gi phyir dngos po 'dzin pa la sgom pa 'khor ba kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is only samsara, since it is meditation on the apprehension of things.

original: ji skad du //üîΩdge ba'am ni mi dge ba //
analyzed: ji skad du // dge ba'am ni mi dge ba //
translated: As has been said:üîΩThere is no distinction whatsoever

original: rnam par rtog dbye gang yang med //
analyzed: rnam par rtog dbye gang yang med //
translated: between virtue and nonvirtue.

original: me yis sreg par byed pa la //
analyzed: me yis sreg par byed pa la //
translated: When fire burns,

original: gzhi yi dbye ba dbye yod min //üîΩtsandan la yang 'bar ba ste //
analyzed: gzhi yi dbye ba dbye yod min // tsandan la yang 'bar ba ste //
translated: there is no distinction of basis.üîΩEven sandalwood burns

original: reg na sreg par byed pa yin //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: reg na sreg par byed pa yin // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and is hot to the touch.

original: chos kyi dbyings yongs su zhus pa las kyang /üîΩthub pa chen po'i chos phung po //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings yongs su zhus pa las kyang / thub pa chen po'i chos phung po //
translated: And in the Inquiry of the Sphere of Reality:üîΩThe eighty-four thousand

original: brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong la //üîΩgang gi de nyid mi shes na //
analyzed: brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong la // gang gi de nyid mi shes na //
translated: aggregates of the Dharma of the Great SageüîΩare all fruitless

original: de dag thams cad 'bras bu med //üîΩces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de dag thams cad 'bras bu med // ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: for those who do not know thatness.üîΩIn order to teach the benefits of attaining that,

original: de thob na phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩbdag la byin brlab rim thob pa'i //
analyzed: de thob na phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir / bdag la byin brlab rim thob pa'i //
translated: it is said:

original: gtso bo sangs rgyas rgyas kun bdag nyid //
analyzed: gtso bo sangs rgyas rgyas kun bdag nyid //
translated: The principal one, the self-nature of all buddhas,üîΩis attained through the stages of self-consecration.

original: tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas ni //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas ni //
translated: In this very life,

original: the tshom med par thob par 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: the tshom med par thob par 'gyur // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: buddhahood is attained without a doubt.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa thob nas /
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa thob nas /
translated: Having attained the stages of self-consecration,

original: tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni tshig gi 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni tshig gi 'brel pa'o //
translated: The phrase one attains buddhahood in this very lifetime is the connection of the words.

original: tshe 'di nyid du ni ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩchos mthong ba la mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid du ni ci'i phyir zhe na / chos mthong ba la mya ngan 'das //
translated: Why is it in this very lifetime?

original: zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the statement one attains nirvana by seeing the truth.

original: rim pa ji la bu zhe na /
analyzed: rim pa ji la bu zhe na /
translated: What is the sequence?

original: sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid ces pa ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid ces pa ni //
translated: The phrase the nature of all buddhas

original: sems can gyi mos pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin dang / de bzhin du gtso bo ni drug pa ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi mos pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin dang / de bzhin du gtso bo ni drug pa ste /
translated: means that by the power of the aspirations of sentient beings, the nature of the five transcendent ones is the nature of the principal one, the sixth,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: which is the nature of Great Vajradhara.

original: 'di nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain the difference between the cause and effect of this, it is said:üîΩThe samƒÅdhi of self-consecration

original: bdag byin brlab pa'i ting 'dzin dang // de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi gnas //
analyzed: bdag byin brlab pa'i ting 'dzin dang // de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi gnas //
translated: and likewise the state of luminosity,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis //
translated: due to the difference between cause and effect,

original: bden pa gnyis su bstan pa yin //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis su bstan pa yin //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: are taught as the two truths.

original: 'dir ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kho na sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin @249a * //
analyzed: 'dir ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kho na sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin @249a * //
translated: Here, the illusion concentration is just dependent origination,

original: te de la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag yod pa rigs so //
analyzed: te de la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag yod pa rigs so //
translated: and it is proper that there be a distinction of cause and effect in it.

original: de la sems kyi 'od gsal ba yi gnas //
analyzed: de la sems kyi 'od gsal ba yi gnas //
translated: The abode of the clear light of mind

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par bdag la byin gyis brlab pa ni 'bras bu ste de las de 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par bdag la byin gyis brlab pa ni 'bras bu ste de las de 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: is the result, because the effect arises from it.

original: bden pa gnyis kyang 'di nyid yin no /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyang 'di nyid yin no /
translated: These are the two truths.

original: gang zag don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: gang zag don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The person is the ultimate truth and the conventional truth.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rnam rtog kun rdzob bshad pa ste //
analyzed: rnam rtog kun rdzob bshad pa ste //
translated: Conceptualization is explained as the conventional;

original: rnam par rtog pa gzhan byed gang //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gzhan byed gang //
translated: what is the conceptualization of another?

original: rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa gang //üîΩde nyid don dam bshad pa yin //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa gang // de nyid don dam bshad pa yin //
translated: What is the cessation of conceptualization?

original: zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
translated: That itself is explained as the ultimate.

original: de bas na 'dir kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin kho na rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin kho na rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, here, the seeing of the conventional truth is just the conceptualization of the illusion concentration.

original: de ni dbye ba gzhan gyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de ni dbye ba gzhan gyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to explain the distinction of cause and effect by another division, he says:

original: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis ni //
analyzed: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis ni //
translated: By the stage of self-consecration

original: 'od gsal ba ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: one attains the clearlight.

original: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
translated: Therefore, the Vajra-Acarya

original: dang por bdag la byin brlab bstan //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dang por bdag la byin brlab bstan // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: first teaches self-consecration.

original: yang na bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rgyu dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'bras bu ste de'i rim gyis de rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rgyu dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'bras bu ste de'i rim gyis de rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cause is the stage of self-consecration, and the clearlight by nature is the effect, because one realizes that by that stage.

original: rgyud 'di nyid kyis dang po bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim par do rje slob dpon gyis slob ma la bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'di nyid kyis dang po bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim par do rje slob dpon gyis slob ma la bstan par bya'o //
translated: The Vajra-Acarya should first teach the stage of self-consecration to the disciple by means of this very Tantra.

original: de bas na rim pa gsum pa la ltos nas rim pa gnyis pa rgyu ste gsum pa 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de bas na rim pa gsum pa la ltos nas rim pa gnyis pa rgyu ste gsum pa 'bras bu'o //
translated: Thus, the second stage is the cause in relation to the third stage, and the third stage is the effect.

original: de bzhin du rim pa gsum pa rgyu ste zhi ba 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rim pa gsum pa rgyu ste zhi ba 'bras bu'o //
translated: Similarly, the third stage is the cause, and peace is the effect.

original: de bas na bdag la byin gyis brlab pa ni rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bdag la byin gyis brlab pa ni rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang de nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, self-consecration is both the cause and the result.

original: 'od gsal ba rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang de nyid yin no zhes grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang de nyid yin no zhes grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: It is the axiom that clear light is both the cause and the result.

original: 'dis ni gang la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni gang la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ste /
translated: This shows that there is no causal relation between anything and itself.

original: dngos po thams cad ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all things are dependent.

original: de bas na gang zhig ltos pa de nyid gzhan dbang yin pas rang bzhin med pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gang zhig ltos pa de nyid gzhan dbang yin pas rang bzhin med pa de nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which is dependent is the relative, and is therefore essenceless.üîΩNow, in order to explain the illusion-like nature of the world, and its cause,

original: da ni 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur yongs su ma shes pa dang / de'i rgyu nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur yongs su ma shes pa dang / de'i rgyu nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: it is said:

original: 'gro kun rang dbang med pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro kun rang dbang med pa ste /
translated: The whole world is not independent,

original: rang dbang du ni 'byung ma yin //
analyzed: rang dbang du ni 'byung ma yin //
translated: it does not occur independently.

original: de yis rgyu ni 'od gsal ba //üîΩ'od gsal thams cad stong pa'o //
analyzed: de yis rgyu ni 'od gsal ba // 'od gsal thams cad stong pa'o //
translated: Its cause is clear light,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: clear light is the emptiness of everything.

original: 'gro ba 'di thams cad sgyu ma lta bu nyid ma shes pas rten cing 'brel pa las skye bar gyur pa ste /üîΩde nyid rang dbang ni de las ldog pas sgyu ma la sogs pa'i @249b rang bzhin rtogs na skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di thams cad sgyu ma lta bu nyid ma shes pas rten cing 'brel pa las skye bar gyur pa ste / de nyid rang dbang ni de las ldog pas sgyu ma la sogs pa'i @249b rang bzhin rtogs na skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: All these beings are like illusions, but because they do not understand that, they are born from dependent origination.

original: glo bur gyi dri mas bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: glo bur gyi dri mas bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: If they realize the nature of illusions and so on, they will not be born, because they are blocked by adventitious defilements.

original: 'o na glo bur gyi dri ma gal te rang dbang ma yin par byed pas nus na /
analyzed: 'o na glo bur gyi dri ma gal te rang dbang ma yin par byed pas nus na /
translated: If you say that adventitious defilements are not autonomous,

original: de'i tshe de rnams de las tha dad pa 'am tha mi dad pa yin //
analyzed: de'i tshe de rnams de las tha dad pa 'am tha mi dad pa yin //
translated: then are they different from the mind or not?

original: gal te tha dad na de'i tshe 'bras bu sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang rgyu 'od gsal ba tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te tha dad na de'i tshe 'bras bu sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang rgyu 'od gsal ba tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are different, then the result, which is like an illusion, and the cause, which is clear light, would be different.

original: de yang 'dod pa ma yin te de'i khyab pa nyid nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang 'dod pa ma yin te de'i khyab pa nyid nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is unacceptable, because it would undermine the pervasion.

original: gal te de rnams tha mi dad pa na de'i tshe bdag nyid gcig yin pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dri ma dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de rnams tha mi dad pa na de'i tshe bdag nyid gcig yin pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dri ma dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are not different, then because they are the same entity, cause and effect would be defiled.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say this:

original: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag gis dri ma de rnams brjod du med pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag gis dri ma de rnams brjod du med pa ste /
translated: Those stains are inexpressible in terms of being different or non-different.

original: gang gi phyir 'od gsal ba dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dag rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'od gsal ba dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dag rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the clear light and self-consecration are not different, since they are completely pure by nature.
